setup_script_description: expands the combobox, sets the combobox value to 'Alabama' and places focus on that option in the listbox popup
task: navigate to next option in listbox popup
specific_user_instruction: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, navigate forwards to the next option.
output_assertions: State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Alaska') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (2) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (56) is conveyed
